faq.question: What about lines, etc?
faq.answer: Line con, queuing for registration or talks, swag, etc, will have to be planned for in new ways , and the guidelines for gatherings will be in flux for a little while. Just expect "social distanced line con" for the in-person event.

faq.question: Will I be required to wear a mask? Will medical exceptions be allowed?
faq.answer: Masks will be required for all participants except while eating or drinking, or if presenting as a DEF CON main stage speaker. If you are unable to wear face coverings due to medical reasons, please consider attending virtually.

faq.question: How will DEF CON maintain social distancing?
faq.answer: Social distancing measures may include distanced seating in event rooms, traffic lanes in the hallways, larger rooms, more strategic areas for food and drinks, dedicated entry and exit points, and more. There will be dedicated support onsite to ensure our rules are being followed.One of the big visible changes is that we have removed all in-person speaking tracks. Because we don't know how many people are planning to attend we couldn't design the floor plan. By releasing the talks online allows us to complete the floor plan and have attendees focus more on village and events.

faq.question: Will food be served and what will that look like?
faq.answer: Chill out lounges and other food service may look a little different than previous years in order to adhere to safety measures, but we intend to provide for purchase take away options in a pre-packaged format. No buffet sneezes to worry about.

faq.question: When & Where will DEF CON be?
faq.answer: August 5, 2021 - August 8, 2021 (Thursday to Sunday)DEF CON will be located within the Paris and Bally's Hotel and Casinos in Las Vegas, Nevada USA.
